error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Verify that address is correct.
error.invalid_auth: Failed to authenticate with device. Verify that device id and local key are correct.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. See log for details.
error.switch_already_configured: Switch with this ID has already been configured.

user.title: Add Tuya device
user.description: Fill in the basic details and pick device type. The name entered here will be used to identify the integration itself (as seen in the `Integrations` page). You will name each sub-device in the following steps.

data.name: Name
data.scan_interval: Scan interval (seconds, only when not updating automatically)

power_outlet.title: Add subswitch
power_outlet.description: You are about to add subswitch number `{number}`. If you want to add another, tick `Add another switch` before continuing.
